rule: "A people name" must not be considered as the full name of an individual person referenced in the input text.
input: Text: The team was led by John.
coverage:
Company names:

People names: John

Specific topics: Team leadership

General themes: Leadership, Teamwork
validityText:
The input uses "Text" with an uppercase "T" instead of the required lowercase `text` field as specified. This does not comply with the input specification that mandates a `text` field with a string value.

ERR
